name: Two Souls One Path
description:
Two Souls One Path

Long time ago, grandpa Emmett died cause a heart attack, he left this world with one task pending; water the tree of his eternal life.

Latetly, little Noah, his grandchild, has been dreaming with his dead grandpa the last few weeks, a very very strange dreams...

Every dream has a different message that Noah has been noticing little by little, now he understand everything: their souls are linked.

Your job is to lead Noha and grandpa Emmett in the world and the beyond respectivelly to find the way to complete the pending task.

So go find the divine liquid to water the tree for grandpa Emmett's soul to live forever.!!

Credits:

Diego Acuña

Fabrizio Alvarado

Dylan González
